assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_For_DeNovo_Initial_Initiation_Criteria_Q21
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: a. Renal dysfunction: an otherwise unexplained decline in eGFR >20% from baseline, or an eGFR<60 ml/min/1.73m2 in patients with no known baseline (provide laboratory data with dates) or serum Cr > the age-appropriate ULN in pediatric patients,
